description:
Hello,

I'm trying to create the network and the bridge using the br100 specified in the nova.conf file to create the network that the virtual machines use.

I have this ouotput when executing the command:
nova network-create private --fixed-range-v4=192.168.100.0/24 --bridge-interface=br100

Output:
ERROR: Malformed request url (HTTP 400) (Request-ID: req-2de7d011-af56-4063-9811-468082c5c373)

It would be grateful if you help me to solve this issue
title: ERROR: Malformed request url (HTTP 400)

comments.content:
We had this issue.  On our system, it was caused by incorrect qpid credentials in /etc/nova/nova.conf.

Commenting them out and restarting the 'openstack-nova-api' service resulted in things working again.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lhh

comments.content: Can you check lon's suggestion?  If that isn't it, can you provide relevant parts of api.log?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content:
Its ok the problem was that i miss the keystone_auth in /etc/nova.conf
thanks for the help
